OtherComments.Content: Miscellaneous Symbols This script makes the width of miscellaneous symbols, geometric shapes, etc., uniform and centres them. Edit the glyph lists and adjust the widths to suit your needs. Grouping glyphs by Advance Width will help to identify glyphs with similar widths.
